texts.label: text
texts.orig: "Daily Task List"
texts.text: "Daily Task List"

texts.label: text
texts.orig: will be the title of the document and should include three sections, followed by the assigned duties for each section.
texts.text: will be the title of the document and should include three sections, followed by the assigned duties for each section.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Section 1 – (Opening Duties)
texts.text: Section 1 – (Opening Duties)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Place this title on the left side under the document title.
texts.text: Place this title on the left side under the document title.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Turn on all demos and ensure they are functioning properly.
texts.text: Turn on all demos and ensure they are functioning properly.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Vacuum the entire department to ensure cleanliness. (Empty vacuum.)
texts.text: Vacuum the entire department to ensure cleanliness. (Empty vacuum.)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Acquire the cash drawer from operations and place it in the register; ensure the register is functioning properly.
texts.text: Acquire the cash drawer from operations and place it in the register; ensure the register is functioning properly.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.
texts.text: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Wipe down all shelves and base decks with cleaner and wipes.
texts.text: Wipe down all shelves and base decks with cleaner and wipes.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.
texts.text: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Assign and schedule lunch for the team to ensure optimized coverage throughout the day.
texts.text: Assign and schedule lunch for the team to ensure optimized coverage throughout the day.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Recap with the next shift on the performance of the day and any potential tasks that need to be completed.
texts.text: Recap with the next shift on the performance of the day and any potential tasks that need to be completed.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Section 2 – (Mid-Day Duties)
texts.text: Section 2 – (Mid-Day Duties)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Place this title on the left side below Section 1.
texts.text: Place this title on the left side below Section 1.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Check that all demos are functional and on.
texts.text: Check that all demos are functional and on.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.
texts.text: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Wipe down all shelves and base decks with a duster or Swiffer.
texts.text: Wipe down all shelves and base decks with a duster or Swiffer.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.
texts.text: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Downstock any product from the warehouse.
texts.text: Downstock any product from the warehouse.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Section 3 – (Closing Duties)
texts.text: Section 3 – (Closing Duties)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Place this title on the left side below Section 2.
texts.text: Place this title on the left side below Section 2.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Turn off all demos and report any functionality issues to the service department.
texts.text: Turn off all demos and report any functionality issues to the service department.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Pull the cash drawer and take it to the front-end leaders to balance and investigate any discrepancies.
texts.text: Pull the cash drawer and take it to the front-end leaders to balance and investigate any discrepancies.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.
texts.text: Verify that the hydraulic lift is operational, plugged in, and charging.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Create and fill out a downstocking report and have a manager sign off on it once completed.
texts.text: Create and fill out a downstocking report and have a manager sign off on it once completed.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.
texts.text: Check all aisles and make sure all products are pulled to the front and flush with the rest of the aisle.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Clean out any personal items on the desk and throw away anything that does not belong.
texts.text: Clean out any personal items on the desk and throw away anything that does not belong.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Have a manager sign off to ensure all closing duties have been completed and file the DTL in the filing cabinet.
texts.text: Have a manager sign off to ensure all closing duties have been completed and file the DTL in the filing cabinet.
